segments.text: I'll always remember my college days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was one of the best times in my life . It was tough , but I made it . I became a college graduate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you feel when you graduated ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was a round day for me . My family attend the graduation ceremony . I was so nervous . I couldn't find my cap and gown , but all worked out in the end .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you do after graduation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was planning to attend gradate school , but then I was offered a good job doing marketing , so I changed my mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like you're happy with your decision .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sure am . So what about you ? How did you feel when you graduated ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was also a proud day for me , but I also felt like a kind of loss that day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: While seeing others going to work or continue their study , I didn't know what I would do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had one , but I didn't like the job very much . I wanted to attend graduate school , but I was afraid it would be too tough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you lack in the power of decision . Once you make your decision , don't be overtaken by misgivings and fear . Just go full steam ahead !
segments.speaker: S1
